name: Elevator Ride
overview: Elevator Ride is a game of daring and acrobatic skill in the face of deadly dangers, and great heights. Help your man avoid the crushing weight of ten tons of metal, screaming straight for him in the form of an elevator out of control. Elevator Ride. A ride to danger. A ride to disaster. A ride to adventure. In this high-strategy game, the player must be alert and attentive at all times, for if not, disaster will strike. Elevator Ride. Where will it stop? The object of the game is to climb the elevator cable to the ground floor, without being hit by an elevator as it descends. If you allow your man to stop moving, the tension on the cable will ease causing the elevator to accelerate and strike you. 3 Levels of difficulty. Called Elevator Ride (To Danger) on the game's title screen.
